message:
Hello all..I'd like to ask about somthing related to gps trackers.. if any one can help plz .
Is it a must to have a SIM  card in the device ?
If not I'd like to know how it works? ?
As I googeld it I found some devices working with a  Sim card and some without. . That's confusing me.. I mean  gps tracker devices not mobile phones. . Thnx in advance..

data.message: I've worked with them sometime ago. The models that I've worked with has sim cards.
في معظم الحالات بيبقى مطلوب إن الاحداثيات تتبعت لك لا سلكي وشبكة المحمول أسهل طريقة لتحقيق كده. لو مش محتاجة الاحداثيات أول بأول فيه برضه GPS logger. ده بيخزن على الذاكرة الداخلية.

you can but an Android phone for less than 300 LE and it would use assisted GPS not true GPS. But Asststed should be good enough for your purposes. I expect a dedicated GPS would have more battery life, just make sure you are not paying too much.

I don't mean Mobiles.. 
Just Gps tracker device and Its not an android based system!

Actully as a read there are devices for tracking immediately   with the new place andwithout Sim card. 
Sim card is only use for talking or listening to the surronding voiices.. !!
Fatma EL-Sayed true GPS means it listens to sattelite signals and that takes a LOT of battery power as I have tested before
cell phone towers are accurate enough as long as you are not aiming to fire a missile :)

Mohamed Samy thnx so much.. :) 
 Did you see an Arabic movie to Ahmad mikki called ( la tragou3 wala esteslam) :D
He gave her mom a nicklas contains a GPS Tracker.. 
If u saw it and have an idea about how like this devices work.. plz help :)

GPS in nature does not need a connection to mobile networks, they get signals from satellites and convert it to longitude and latitude. GPS is far more accurate than mobile network positioning, but it requires an open sky view to receive the signal. If the open sky is not a problem for your application then go for it.
Hisham Abd El-Hafez Eid thanq so much  for the to the point Comment :)

I'v heard there is small GPS device for keeping an eye on the cars, it is small, and it uses both GPS and mobiles tours positioning, but I think some types needs power source, because it has small batteries that gives only about 30m to 1 hour, anyone have a car should know places to get it from
